titles.title: A bill to rename the Homestead National Monument of America near Beatrice, Nebraska, as the Homestead National Historical Park.
A bill to rename the Homestead National Monument of America near Beatrice, Nebraska, as the Homestead National Historical Park.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill redesignates the Homestead National Monument of America in Nebraska as the "Homestead National Historical Park."
